round_best: Develop an AI-driven tool that dynamically collaborates with users to write fiction by progressively learning their writing style and thematic preferences. This tool would use an initial set of user-provided cues such as genre, plot ideas, and character sketches to generate a base narrative. Over time, as the user edits and provides feedback on the AI-generated content, the system refines its understanding and output, essentially co-creating more personalized and contextually rich stories.
